topics.body:
You know what one of my favorite parts of thanksgiving is? The open faced turkey sandwiches I get to eat till December.

Now, while I still maintain that the Reuben is the undisputed king of all sandwiches, all the thanksgiving fixins (in my case turkey, mashed potatoes, cranberry sauce, and corn pudding) piled high and slathered with gravy... well it is a wonderful experience.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
